Movie.Description: A young man faces a difficult time as he struggles against the privatization of education.
The plot revolves around two individuals in love. They both are professional chefs. They cross paths and things completely change. Will they be able to sort off the complexities and stay together?
After Bala, who works for a TV channel, gets into trouble with a thug, he is sent away for an out-of-town assignment. He meets and falls in love with a woman who is shortly kidnapped by a gangster.
A tribal man, bound by tradition, arrives in the city to kidnap his betrothed. He incidentally also meets the girl's lover who, after realising his intentions, sets out to rescue her.
Mahendran borrows a huge amount of money for his daughter's operation. However, when a group of criminals steals his money, Mahendran seeks police inspector Tamilarasan's help.
The film narrates the tale of a ragpicker, who does petty thefts and leads a happy life with his friends.
The young Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu (Santhosh Prathap) is kidnapped and goes missing suddenly and the main suspect is Nanjilaar (Gautham Vasudev Menon) the deputy CM who owns the majority of MLAs.
The film opens with a kind-hearted street-rowdy who manages his problem and promises to help his stepsister arrives.

Starring Sree Vishnu and Reba Monica John play the lead roles. The movie is written and directed by Ram Abbaraju. The movie also stars Naresh, Srikanth Iyengar, Vennala Kishore, and many others in prominent roles. The music is composed by Gopi Sundar.
Siddharth, a technician, and Mahalakshmi, a wrestler, fall in love with each other and wish to get married. However, their families oppose their union, landing them in a tough spot.
Guru Murthy, a rich landlord, and his brother abuse the lower castes. However, Mohan Rao and his brother decide to fight the tyranny of the landlords, sparking communal tension.

Shakthi (Sivakarthikeyan), a superhero fanatic since his childhood fails to fulfil Meera's (Kalyani Priyadarshan) proposal of getting an engineering college admission for an extremely talented girl in a legit way. When he discovers that it was Mahadev (Abhay Deol) who has corrupted the education system, Shakthi decides to transform into a superhero and fight Mahadev & his henchmen.

Ramarao on Duty is a 2022 Indian Telugu-language mystery action drama film written and directed by Sarath Mandava. Produced by SLV Cinemas and RT Team Works, it stars Ravi Teja in titular role alongside Divyansha Kaushik, Rajisha Vijayan, Chaitanya Krishna, and Venu Thottempudi.
An ex-military man beats up corrupt individuals who have escaped punishment from the law. However, he is caught in a dilemma when his lover promises to marry him only if he gives up his violent ways.

Arjun, a spoilt young man, is jealous of his neighbour, Anu, as she gets doted on by everyone around him. He finds out that she wishes to move abroad for higher education and decides to ruin her plan.
Dhruva, an IPS officer, discovers a strong network of organised crime. He then intends to take down the mastermind behind a huge racket and encounters numerous challenges on his way.
Terror and turmoil fill the air when many prominent leaders are held hostage by Godse. This triggers an investigation by a diligent police officer who sets off to probe Godse's motive.
Ravi happens to cross paths with Bittu, a gangster, and helps the police foil his plan to rob a bank. Eventually, Bittu resolves to destroy Ravi and his family.
Arjun, a talented but failed cricketer, decides to return to cricket in his late thirties driven by the desire to represent the Indian cricket team and fulfil his son's wish for a jersey as a gift.
As Gautham, an aspiring writer, grieves his heartbreak by penning his thoughts in the form of love stories, he recognises the mistakes made by him in his relationship.
